name: Number Merge - Block Puzzle
description:
Number Merge - Block Puzzle is a brand new puzzle game!
Just tap on the empty cell to place the number!
Merge them into a bigger number!


FEATURES
•Easy to learn, hard to master
A new type of brain training puzzle, entertain your brain for minutes or hours.

• Minimalism graphics
The art design is simple but beautiful. It's a game for all ages.

• Playing the game with your FRIENDS
We support online rank list! You can challenge your friends by leaderboard.

• Free to play, WIFI is not a must

• Exercise the brain and make people smart

Enjoy the game with your family ;)
If you have some good ideas about Number Merge - Block Puzzle, please send us an email in the game!
